message: Schema/docs mismatch: repo snapshots still list legacy Modbus columns in base tables and view, while code expects dual-address model.

evidence: docs/schema/table_columns.json shows component_parameters includes modbus_address/modbus_type alongside read/write fields
data.impact: Unclear whether DB migration actually dropped legacy columns; at minimum, docs snapshot is stale. Code runs with new view fields but acceptance requires legacy removal.
data.recommendation: Confirm Supabase migration applied; re-export OpenAPI and table column snapshots post-migration; if legacy columns remain in DB, complete drop + update view.
